name: Salat Time وقت الصلاة
description: The Salat Time (prayer time) addon is a web-based tool that provides accurate and up-to-date prayer times for various cities around the world.The addon displays the prayer timings for Fajr, Sunrise, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha. Additionally, the addon now includes a countdown timer that shows the time remaining until the next prayer time based on the current system time and the prayer times for the selected city.
